column4: Any idea as to why the repository team goes to so much length as to describe how the security team will not audit the universe repository, but then adds dapper-security universe lines to the bottom of the sources.list file? =P
Though on a less silly tone, anyone know what issues may be causing the respository team from including dnsmasq from the main respository?
its from the military, it means cover your rear end
thanks, just google and found out the same :)
